title: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
text: Currently I'm a Sophomore at RPI, an engineering school in upstate New York. I'm a dual major in Computer Science and Economics

Aside from my studies, I'm an instructor and vice president for coding&&community, a club that provides CS education to underrepresented groups in the tech industry. This past spring semester, I organized a hackathon for local high school students.
I also work as the lead software developer for RPI's student union, building web applications that serve the entire student community.
